user.name: Stanley Mayore
user.bio: Passionate junior software developer experienced in backend and frontend development, proficient in programming, committed to staying updated.

node.name: portfolio
node.description: This is a developer portfolio template. It's an open source project that's intended to be managed by BebetoRealon and I.

node.name: sendit-courier-services
node.description: Sendit Courier Services is a parcel-transporting web-based application. The app was built by six collaborators including me. The main aim was to make sending of parcels easy across the world.

node.name: abojani-academy
node.description: Abojani academy is a we-based application intended to inform people about financial literacy. With this app, people can easily learn how to manage their finances in their day to day lactivities.

node.name: kcb-app-backend
node.description: This is an API of a banking system. Just like any other bank, the API has users, accounts, transactions and much more services that are offered in a bank.

node.name: inventory-management-system-backend
node.description: This is the backend of an inventory management system. It helps track inventory in and out the store, the available stock and new arrivals.

node.name: inventory-tracker
node.description: This is the frontend of an inventory tracking system. It consumes an api and displays the inventory in a way that meets the available conditions.
